biotools.summary:
an R/Bioconductor package for Clustering and Visualizing Functional Enrichment Results.

Simplify Functional Enrichment Results.

A new method (binary cut) is proposed to effectively cluster GO terms into groups from the semantic similarity matrix. Summaries of GO terms in each cluster are visualized by word clouds.

Compare similarity measurements for functional terms.

Compare partitioning methods in binary cut clustering.

Clustering, GO, GeneSetEnrichment, Software, Visualization.
